ygData.subject: How to use Log4j
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All, I have embeded Heritrix into my program. My program is application. my app use Log4j for logging infomation, and wrote the log to the File system.

Hi All,

   I have embeded Heritrix into my program. My program is applicat=
ion.
my app use Log4j for logging infomation, and wrote the log to the File=

system. Well, my program log can write the file , but the Heritrix'
log al=
so wrote the console.. so depressed..

------------------

My commons-loggi=
ng.properties is:
org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory=3Dorg.apache.common=
s.logging.impl.Log4jFactory
org.apache.commons.logging.Log=3Dorg.apache.com=
mons.logging.impl.Log4JLogger


------------------
